title: Optimus Under Threat
description: Roll out with Optimus Prime, Bumblebee and the rest of the heroic Autobots as they battle the evil Decepticons.Starscream has been searching Earth to find the mighty Con Skyquake, whose mission is to destroy Optimus under ancient orders from Megatron. Is Optimus ready to face his old enemy once again?
author: Bantam Books
